title.zh: 线上：国际妇女节科普视频发布
title.en: Online: International Women's Day Educational Videos Released

description.zh: 在国际妇女节这天，左钰洁发布了3个中文科普宣传视频。其中一个视频与华中科技大学公共卫生学院陈振阳同学合作，参与了华中科技大学同济学院公共卫生学院举办的大学生健康科普大赛，在6天内获得1900多枚真实投票，最终获得三等奖。这些视频以生动的形式普及血友病女性知识，提高公众认知。
description.en: On International Women's Day, Yujie (Ruby) Zuo released 3 Chinese educational promotional videos. One video was created in collaboration with Chen Zhenyang from the School of Public Health at Huazhong University of Science and Technology, participating in the College Students' Health Science Competition organized by Tongji School of Public Health. It received over 1,900 real votes in 6 days and won third prize. These videos popularize knowledge about women with hemophilia in a vivid format, raising public awareness.

description.zh: 华中科技大学大学生健康科普大赛三等奖奖状
description.en: Third prize certificate from HUST College Students' Health Science Competition

description.zh: 科普视频在6天内获得1900多枚真实投票的成果展示
description.en: Results showing the educational video received over 1,900 real votes in 6 days

description.zh: 国际妇女节发布的血友病女性科普视频截图
description.en: Screenshot from hemophilia women's educational video released on International Women's Day
